titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Steel Ball Bearing, 62 millimeters outside diameter x 30 millimeters inside diameter x 16 millimeters width.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
1/29/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Steel Ball Bearing, 62 millimeters outside diameter x 30 millimeters inside diameter x 16 millimeters width.
